thread.title: TV | Beverly Hills Cop III
thread.title_full: TV | Beverly Hills Cop III - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Beverly Hills Cop III
text: Eddie Murphy back in his heyday of awesomeness, although he never really stopped being a legend in fairness. He stars as maverick cop Axel Foley in the third and final installment of the Beverly Hills Cop movies. This time round, he returns to LA when an investigation into a colleague's murder leads him to a Hollywood theme park. He gets old ally Rosewood on board to help him prove the resort is a cover for a major counterfeiting ring connected to a terrorist conspiracy. Undoubtedly, one of the BEST scenes of all the movies is in this one, when Foley finds himself dangling from the terrifying heights of a Big Wheel in pursuit of a suspect, all while the catchy theme music plays in the background. Remember? Doo, doo, dodadoo, doo do... Yeah okay, I'll stop now.
